name: Furni-Jumpin'
description:
Furni-Jumpin' is a fun 2D platformer arcade game where you take control of a small weird creature in his path to reach for a big score. Take special items such as milk, springs and fish to reduce your gravity, increase your lives or be temporarily invincible to face and dodge as many enemies as possible - while jumping on furniture!

> Main features:
- Double jump;
- Special items to collect that grant benefits (eg. gravity reduction);
- Furniture platforms;
- Endless and procedurally generated map with increasing difficulty;
- Retro-style graphics;
- Hi-Score autosave.
